thread.title: The tale of two lads and a water tank
thread.title_full: The tale of two lads and a water tank

title: The tale of two lads and a water tank
text:
The tale of two lads and a water tank 
Monday 5 Oct 2015 7:00 p.m. By Duncan Garner 
Thanks to some strong Canterbury winds over the weekend, two Kiwi truck drivers have become world-famous. 
Jake Taylor and Quentin Johansen filmed themselves driving while chasing a water tank and in less than 24 hours, their video has gone viral, having been viewed more than 2 million times. 
The two truck drivers have been receiving calls from US media outlets and spoke to Story about what happened and the international reaction. 
Watch the video for the full Story report. TRENDING
